page.title: 16Guide celebrations in Dalton
page.content: In 1985 the girl guides are celebrating the 75th.anniversary of their formation.There has been many celebrations for the guides and brownies.Lady Baden Powell founded the guides in 1910.All the guides and brownies were given a 75 year badge to sew on their uniforn at the beginning of the year.One of the most inportant celebrations was when the guides and brownies of South Cumbria went to Levens Hall to collect a birthday candle.The candle we saw was originally lit at Buckingham Palace by Princess Margaret and distributed to regional commissioners from all parts of the country.The regional commission travelled all over the north west of England and passed on the candle to the various commissioners at Levens Hall as well as at other venues.
